display_long_description:
**New: Multiplayer! You can now play together with your friends in co-op or against each other!** 1-4 players can join up to fight scarecrows, shoot targets, or each other.

 Previously: **Kriss Vector, M16A1, Steyr AUG, RPG-7**!

Shoot more than **50 weapons** at various targets in this fun sandbox range! Blast and fight in **120 fps** with accurate ballistics and weapon mechanics, at our target-rich farm!

[media]

**Assault rifles**: XM7 - M4 - M14 - M16A1 - AKM/AK47 - AK12 - L85a3 - G36C - FN SCAR-H - FAMAS - Steyr AUG

**Support**: M249 SAW LMG - RPG-7 - PKM - M203 & GP25 under-barrel launchers - M67 Hand grenade - M18 Smoke grenade - Landmine

**Submachineguns**: FN P90 - MAC-10 - MP5A3 - MP5SD - Thompson M1928A1 - Beretta 93R - Kriss Vector

**Rifles**: AR-15 - Dragunov - M107 .50-cal - M1 Garand

**Bolt action**: M24 - CZ .22LR - AWM - Mosin Nagant - Brown Bess

**Shotguns**: SPAS-12 - Benelli M4 - Mossberg S/S - Beretta O/U - "Mad Max" - Sawn-off pump - AA12

**Handguns**: M1911 - Glock 17 - Desert Eagle - Beretta M9 - Glock 44 - Glock 19 - Colt Python (6- & 2.5-inch) - S&W TRR8 - Flintlock - SIG M17

[media]

**Optics, scopes, bipods, lasers and suppressors** can be fitted, and firing modes picked.

**Ranges** with:
- angry scarecrows and big bosses,
- plinking, spinning, and destructible targets,
- scoring targets, moving & stationary,
- clays, trap, skeet, pumpkins,
- chickens, hogs & a truck,
- a ShootBarn and Desert Village - clear corridors and houses,

and more!
[media]
https://discord.gg/r3JYKWMYME

reddit.com/r/gunsgame

120 Hz works if enabled!

Free demo - GUNSdemo!
[media]
